The %c[pda_white]RF Receiver %c[ui_gray_2]is a small device with a highly-sensitive RF module used for basic communications.
 
 %c[pda_green]Information
 %c[ui_gray_2]Quite common among soldiers despite the old technology. As the name suggests, it has the ability to interact with radio signals in a radius of 200m. The device is able to process radio waves with a frequency range between 10MHz and 999MHz (configurable in MCM).
 
 %c[pda_blue]Usage
 %c[ui_gray_2]While holding the receiver, you can switch the radio frequency.
 %c[pda_white]• %c[ui_gray_2]Press the '%c[pda_white]Mouse-1%c[ui_gray_2]' button to increase the frequency.
 %c[pda_white]• %c[ui_gray_2]Press the '%c[pda_white]Mouse-2%c[ui_gray_2]' button to decrease the frequency.
 %c[pda_white]• %c[ui_gray_2]Hold the '%c[pda_white]Left-Shift%c[ui_gray_2]' button to increase frequency jumps by 10Hz while increasing / decreasing the current frequency.
 %c[pda_white]• %c[ui_gray_2]Hold the '%c[pda_white]Left-Alt%c[ui_gray_2]' button to increase frequency jumps by 50Hz while increasing / decreasing the current frequency.
 %c[pda_white]• %c[ui_gray_2]Consumes %c[pda_white]0.1 uAh/s%c.
